alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 5:38AM EST until February 18 at 7:51PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Eagle Creek At Phalanx Station affecting Trumbull County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Tuscarawas River At Massillon affecting Stark County. Mahoning River At Youngstown affecting Mahoning and Trumbull Counties. Mahoning River At Leavittsburg affecting Trumbull County. Mahoning River At Warren affecting Trumbull County. For the Tuscarawas River...including Massillon...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Mahoning River...including Leavittsburg, Warren, Youngstown...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Site Specific Non-forecast Pt...including Phalanx Station... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mahoning River At Leavittsburg. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.5 feet, Flood waters encroach on Meadowbrook Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 11.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon to 12.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon to 8.3 feet and begin rising again tomorrow evening. It will rise to 8.4 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall to 7.6 feet and begin rising again early Monday afternoon. It will then rise again but remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 12.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.5 feet on 03/09/2009. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 315 PM EST.
